ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Charles E. Haliburton ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. CHARLES E. HALIBURTON, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective January 31, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
